articles.title: 'BOYCOTT DISNEY': Watch Protestors Gather Outside the House of Mouse to Pushback on Woke Agenda - Sean Hannity
articles.description: All is not well at the House of Mouse. The Walt Disney Company is seeing some serious pushback from parents on its latest woke policy initiatives. Protestors gathered outside Disney HQ in Burbank Wednesday night to make their voices heard.
